introduction: In this video, we will build a job board app as an MVP that pulls data from a single job board API, filters the jobs, and displays them on a React frontend. We will also set up a Node.js backend with Redis for data storage and a cron job to refresh the data at regular intervals.

sections.title: Section 1: Setting up the project
content: Create a new React app with Material UI
Create a cron job to fetch jobs and refresh data

sections.title: Section 2: Fetching jobs from the API
content: Create a function to fetch jobs from the API

sections.title: Section 3: Displaying jobs on the frontend
content: Create a component to display jobs

sections.title: Section 4: Storing jobs in Redis
content: Set up a Redis client in Node.js
Implement a worker to fetch and store jobs at regular intervals

sections.title: Section 5: Deploying the app
content: Set up a domain and configure DNS
Install and configure PM2 for production
Deploy the app to a server
